Circular No. 23/ 2006 
 
Subject:- 
Procedures in the Aircraft Operators Security Programme for 
passengers subject  to  judicial  or administrative  proceedings  
are obliged  to travel 
 
Each aircraft operator  providing a service  to / from airports in India shall  
include the following procedures in the Aircraft Operators Security Programme to 
ensure safety on board  when passengers subject  to  judicial  or administrative  
proceedings  are obliged  to travel: 
  
(i) 
Station Manager / Airport Manager of the  concerned  airlines  shall  
ensure  that the  Pilot-in-Command (PIC)  is  notified  as to the 
number of  such  persons  and their  seat allocation alongwith  their 
escorts  on board the aircraft. 
 
(ii) 
In this connection instructions issued  vide  this Bureau Circular 
No.42/2005  dated  24.10.2005 shall be  strictly  adhered to.  
 
2. 
The  above  instructions  shall be implemented  with immediate effect. 
 
 
 
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of  Security (CA)
